name: VOIDBREAK
description:
WELCOME TO VOIDBREAK . . .

If there’s no way out, make your own.

///////////////////////////////////////////////////

This game is largely unfinished, mostly due to a domestic situation out of both mine and @Place’s control. We have essentially been travelling to whatever local cafés/libraries/hotels are open to work on our game. We are nowhere near done but honestly… I’m proud as heck of what we’ve accomplished, especially given the circumstances the past several weeks have presented us.
